title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in the Photon version of the Java editor, the expected popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
OB:
1) Open a java editor. 
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. 

Observed Behavior: The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc., does not appear.
EB: Expected Behavior: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior: A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
